title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: Cork-born attacking midfielder David Hurley joined Galway United in 2020 and has been a key figure ever since. Hurley signed from Cobh Ramblers in November 2020. He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title. His standout performances earned him Player of the Year and a place in the PFAI Team of the Year. Hurley re-signed for 2025, continuing as a vital part of the squad.
